page.title: 07Broxton Wood.
page.content: { Broxton Wood}is a very interesting place to go for a walk.There are many kinds of trees,flowers,fungi,birds and animals to see and it is very peaceful Once there was a coal mine and a stone quarry there,so it must have been a very busy and noisy place.The coal mine closed at the turn of the century and when the miners left the four little cottages where they stayed were added onto and made into a wood side cottage where Shep the dog and {Mr.and Mrs.Dorricott}now live. When you walk in the woods,following the rabbit tracks,you find coal and beautiful fossils with fern and shells in them so you can think about the world and the way it was made.
